茮茮茮

茮字的基本解释

茮
jiāo
古同“椒”，花椒。

茮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》即消切，平宵，精。］
(1)同“椒”。花椒。
(2)一种类似茱萸的植物。
[②]［niǎo］
［《集韻》乃了切，上筱，泥。］
见“苭茮”。

茮字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茮； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1028第23
【唐韻】卽消切，音焦。【說文】莍也，似茱萸。註詳椒字。　又【集韻】乃了切。苭茮，草長貌，亦作?。

茮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
茮字的起名意思

暂无。

Long
Basic explanation of words
Long
jiāo
Ancient with "pepper", pepper.
Long
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāo］
["Guangyun" is to eliminate cutting, flat night, fine. ]
(1) Same as "Jiao". Pepper.
(2) A plant similar to cornel.
[②]［niǎo］
["Ji Yun" is cut, on the small, mud. ]
See "苭茮".
Long
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　茮; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1028 Page 23
[Tang Yun] 卽 cleared and cut, sound focus. 【Said the text】Muscularis, like cornel. Note the detailed pepper word.　[Jiyun] again, it’s cut. Zangjiao, long grass, is also used for?.
